name: Garlic Blood
description:
You are a blood mage that fights vampires, to do so you gotta make your blood lethal to them, eating garlic. 

You can use garlic-blood fueled skills to fight vampires.

When you eat a lot of garlic and have a lot of garlic-blood the regeneration of your blood (hp) is reduced, so be carefull, garlic is good but never exagerate. 

You can pour your blood on the ground to grow garlic.

To Play: Download and Extract the zip, in the folder double click the GarlicBlood.exe file  

Developer : Gianni Vallerini

Artist : porkteriyaki

Sound Designer :  Leon_XXIV
